quoteFirst: "_Fearless_ and the 1st Flotilla were very usefully employed as a submarine screen during the earlier part of the 31st May. At
quoteLast: , when joining the Battle Fleet, _Fearless_ was unable to follow the battle cruisers without fouling the battleships, and therefore took station at the rear of the line. She sighted during the night a battleship of the _Kaiser_ class steaming fast and entirely alone.
title: World's War Events, Vol. II

quoteFirst: And it was here, at this spot--where a granite column was raised subsequently, with an inscription in letters of gold: two names and a date--it was here, on the 4th of June, at
quoteLast: in the evening, above a vast amphitheatre girt about with sand-hills like the benches of a circus, it was here that Simon Dubosc at last saw, climbing to meet him, a man.
